page.title: 11The Welcombe Hotel S.on A.
page.content: Life Styles. The Welcombe Hotel is set in grounds which cover about 153 acres including an 18 hole golf course.There are 84 rooms,20 of which are of a very superior standard.A maximum of 140 guests can stay at one time.There is a staff of 100,16 of whom are chefs.In 1984 30000 people stayed at the Hotel. In the summer most of the guests are tourists from America,Japan,Germany, Holland,and France.In winter there is a greater proportion of business conference members.Many famous people stay at the Hotel including royalty and show business personalities. The Queen herself visited in 1985.The guests are entertained by comedians and bands by arrangement.The Hotel is owned by the same Company which owns The Orient Express.The building has 7 external doors,52 chimneys,and 365 window panels!It was built in 1871.
